thread.title_full: Anthony Randazzo talks Apple Pay Struggles on Fox Business' After the Bell - Reason.com

author: reason.com
title: Anthony Randazzo talks Apple Pay Struggles on Fox Business' After the Bell - Reason.com
text:
Reason Foundation director of economic research Anthony Randazzo appeared on Fox Business' After the Bell to discuss the upsides, and the dangers, of investment of American dollars in Chinese companies as well as the struggles of Apple to implement its digital payment system, Apple Pay, in the retail marketplace.
Original Air Date: October 27, 2014.
Approximately 4 minutes.
